page.title: 17THE OVER-SIXTIES CLUB
page.content: The over-sixties club was formed in November 1979 by the then Rector,Rev. G.Stone.Thirty-one members attend monthly meetings in the village hall. There is a committee of seven, and three helpers attend regularly to provide refreshments.The members,who come from Therfield and Kelshall area, enjoy games afternoons, when bingo, scrabble and whist are very popular. Outings are arranged about twice a year and have included trips to the sea, canal boat excursions, and mystery tours. The club also visits other clubs in the area and further afield; visiting clubs then attend the annual church service held in Therfield in the summer. Funds are raised at coffee mornings so that members may continue to enjoy the comradeship of others and the club may further flourish.
